phrs.translation: 流行病学调查；列病学甸

sentences.sentence: Ancel Keys performed an epidemiological analysis of diets around the world.
sentences.translation: 安塞尔·基斯对世界各地的饮食进行了流行病学分析。

sentences.sentence: Dr. Ancel Keys performed an epidemiological analysis of diets around the world.
sentences.translation: 安塞尔·基斯博士对世界各地的饮食进行了流行病学分析。

sentences.sentence: Epidemiological studies have found that children with PDD have no higher prevalence of gastrointestinal tract than normal children.
sentences.translation: 流行病学研究发现，广泛性发育障碍（Pervasive Developmental Disorder）孩子和正常孩子相比较并没有更高的胃肠道患病率。
